--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> OOC: The Dark Avian is the Decepticon base, not the place Domnijoe 
and 
> Blindchaos crashed, infact it is quite a long distance away from 
where 
> Northlight's chars landed. All of the characters that you are 
> following haven't been at the crash site for about 2 days (our 
time), 
> they have been heading towards the Dark Avian. Since your character 
> neared the crash site, there is probably no way he could have seen 
any 
> of the bots. Just trying to clear up what looks to be a 
> misunderstanding. Jer tells me that Northlight's characters landed 
in 
> Africa. (did they Northlight?) =)
> 



   OOC: I actually didn't pick a spot for them to land, just a random 
spot on Earth. Since Africa was mentioned, lets say Africa, right 
around Cairo (How DO you spell it?) in Egypt.
   Heck..I need a spot, so why not? *Blindchaos-like grin*

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
